SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Include Promotions Content in Bot-Enabled Pages

Include more valuable content in storefront pages served directly to search engine bots, and help elevate the search ranking of your pages. B2B Commerce for Visualforce now includes images for all promotion types and valid promotion locations on the bot-enabled Home, Product List, and Product Detail pages.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

Why: Previous versions of B2B Commerce for Visualforce didn't include promotions content on bot-enabled pages. Promotions add value-rich content that contributes to the search ranking of your storefront's pages.

How: When you upgrade the managed package and enable bot detection, your existing promotions are included in your bot-enabled pages automatically. No extra setup is necessary.

For details about which promotion configurations are supported in bot-enabled pages, check out the bot-enabled page help.

SEE ALSO
Serve Bot-Enabled Versions of Storefront Pages
Set Up Promotions for B2B Commerce for Visualforce
